header.title: Welcome to Temacina.Com
header.subtitle: Algerian Digital Marketplace for Global B2B e-Commerce and e-Sourcing

founder.name: Mr. Mustapha FAROUROU
founder.title: Expert in New Technology and Specialist in Global Digital Business

introduction.title: Welcome to Temacina.Com
introduction.content: We are delighted to offer you an Innovative Digital Marketplace in Global B2B eCommerce / eSourcing. Our goal is to facilitate your business relationships and B2B transactions, promoting your Products and Services to and from the Algerian, African, and international markets.

quote.text: I chose the name of our marketplace "Temacina.Com" based on the name of my hometown, Temacine, located in the wilaya of Touggourt, within the oasis of Oued Righ in Algeria.
quote.author: Mr. Mustapha Farourou

mission.title: OUR MISSION
mission.content: To facilitate global eCommerce and eSourcing between Algerian, African, and global companies in import/export.

items.title: Local B2B eSourcing
items.description: Temacina.Com connects Algerian companies on the local market in Dinars, covering various sectors essential to the Algerian economy. We focus on specific sectors, providing a specialized platform for Algerian companies to thrive in today's global economy.

items2.title: International B2B eSourcing
items2.description: Temacina.Com broadens the horizons of Algerian companies by facilitating international exchanges in Dollars. We connect Algerian companies with foreign partners, promoting the export and import of products and services.

vision.title: OUR VISION
vision.content: To become the leading Algerian Digital Marketplace for B2B commerce in Algeria, Africa, and globally.
